document.full_text: world number two kim clijsters avoided any mishaps in a 6-2 6-3 first-round win over belarussian anastasiya yakimova as she made her return to the french open after a five-year absence tuesday.
document.title: clijsters proves fitness in first-round win
lines_and_colors: world number two kim clijsters avoided any mishaps in a 6-2 6-3 first-round win over belarussian anastasiya yakimova as she made her return to the french open after a five-year absence tuesday.
